duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and execute certification activities for cellular modules certifications/approvals with cellular operators.
Prepare required documents for certification process and compliance matrixes.
Interface with carriers to drive certification process and drive completion of carrier certification at external labs.
Travel to carrier test labs and external test labs as needed to achieve timely certification.
Interface with internal Product Management teams to feedback carrier requirements and achieve continuous improvement in product compliance.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science in Engineering or equivalent education and work experience
